Jacaranda Flame Consulting (University of Sydney)

Internship Consultant — Client: Cerebral Palsy Alliance (CPA)

Camperdown, NSW · Jun 2024 – Jul 2024

Worked in a consulting-style engineering team delivering client outcomes for the Cerebral Palsy Alliance, balancing technical development with stakeholder communication and project delivery.

Highlights

  • Delivered engineering work directly for CPA under a structured project charter and deadlines
  • Elected team leader: coordinated tasks, managed weekly progress, and maintained momentum
  • Prototyped and tested custom seating concepts (including 3D-printed components)
  • Led client-facing discussions to align technical decisions with user needs and constraints
  • Contributed to formal documentation (design rationale, risk considerations, and deliverables)

→ Related project details: Customised Seating Solutions for Individuals with Cerebral Palsy
